newsItems.title: Coding And Science Exhibition 2025
newsItems.content: There will be coding exhibition this coming month on the 20th oct 2025, Parents are invited to be around and witness their children's performance

newsItems.title: Welcome to the New School Year!
newsItems.content: We are excited to welcome all students, new and returning, to Kourkyls International School for another amazing year of learning and growth.

newsItems.title: Parent-Teacher Meetings
newsItems.content: Parent-teacher meetings will be held next week. Please check the school portal to book a slot with your child's teachers.
